romy 0.0.1
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • getting_started

    This function performs the training for (co)variance testing.

    dot-train_models_covar.Rd

    This function performs the training for (co)variance testing.

    .train_models_covar(
  Y1_1,
  Y2_2,
  Y1_3,
  Y2_3,
  X_1,
  X_2,
  X_3,
  Z_1,
  Z_2,
  Z_3,
  learner_y_stage1,
  learner_y_stage2,
  learner_x,
  prediction_y_stage1,
  variance = FALSE
)

    Arguments

    Y1_1

    Measurements for Y1_1.

    Y2_2

    Measurements for Y2_2.

    Y1_3

    Measurements for Y1_3.

    Y2_3

    Measurements for Y2_3.

    X_1

    Measurements for X_1.

    X_2

    Measurements for X_2.

    X_3

    Measurements for X_3.

    Z_1

    Measurements for Z_1.

    Z_2

    Measurements for Z_2.

    Z_3

    Measurements for Z_3.

    learner_y_stage1

    Prediction model function to learn prediction of Y given X and Z in stage 1.

    learner_y_stage2

    Prediction model function to learn prediction of Y given X and Z in stage 2.

    learner_x

    Prediction model function to learn prediction of X given Z.

    prediction_y_stage1

    Prediction model to predict Y in stage 1.

    variance

    Logical variable to indicate if Y1=Y2.

    Contents

    Developed by Julian Hecker.
